text.p: KWK Legacy - (built 1993) 149,000 dwt del UK prompt trip via Hampton Roads plus Richards Bay redel Japan $15,000/$15,250 daily Shinwa.
Chungjin - (built 1993) 69,634 dwt 13.5 on 28 del Cigading 22-23/10 trip via Australia redel Japan $8,100 daily K Line.
Navarino - (built 1983) 63,880 dwt 13 on 30 plus 1.5 del Nopac 20-30/10 trip Bin Qasim $7,500 daily plus $150,000 bb Gemstar.
Budi Huda - (built 1976) 50,250 dwt del Canakkale 10-20/10 trip Black Sea redel Far East $10,750 daily Linkvest.
Star Pollux - (built 1996) 43,769 dwt 14 on 24 del Continent 20-31/10 trip Singapore-Japan range $11,250 daily Pan Ocean.
Agiasophia - (built 1976) 34,337 dwt del Continent prompt USG $6,500 Combac.
Hardman H - (built 1982) 26,400 dwt del Richards Bay 10-20/10 trip Continent $3,750 daily IVS.
Elinda - (built 1979) 8,207 dwt del Dunkirk 11-12/10 trip west Africa $4,925 daily Sometra.
